snippet.title: Time Rifters Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam October 21!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/270010/

Time Rifters is a single player co-op shooter where 'time rifts' allow you to be your own team mates.

Unlock upgrades and customize each of your time clones. Strategically plan your attack with yourself in the past & future.

Find out more at http://www.timerifters.net/

Follow us on:
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/270010/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TimeRifters
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ProtonStudioInc
Reddit: http://www.reddit.com/r/protonstudio
